import { useEffect, useRef, useState} from 'react' import './contenidoBeneficioAdmin.css' import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from "axios"; import env from "../../env.json"; import Form from "react-validation/build/form"; import Input from "react-validation/build/input"; const ContenidoBeneficioAdmin = () => { const formRef = useRef(); const [ roles, setRol ] = useState([]); const obtenerRol= async () => { try { const response = await axios.get(`${env.host}/api/roles`); setRol(response.data); } catch (err) { console.log(err); } }; return (
Inicio/
); } export default ContenidoBeneficioAdmin;
